definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: branch frond (prob. of palm tree, cf. [[כַּף]]

definitions.title: 3 d
definitions.body: );—´[[כ]] Is 9:13, Is 19:15 fig. of nobles, rulers (both opp. [[אַגְמוֹן]] rush, i.e. high and low; ‖[[רׂאשׁ וְזׇנׇב]]); c. sf. [[כִּפָּתוֹ]] Job 15:32 (of wicked under fig. of palm-tree).
